comments.body: Quote from: MILLIONPIXELNFT on August 02, 2022, 02:08:11 PMcontract0xb2ebbff04bdcb3ded0cb99c544521a17e940ff96Short discriptionMILLION PIXEL XIX is the Project Token from one MILLION PIXEL Project1.000 x 1.000 Pixel = 1.000.000 Pixel total number XIX TOKEN = 1.000.000 XIXThe more pixels are paid with XIX, the higher the value of the project token increases.This incentive not only creates a higher reach for the NFT project but also an increase in the overallAttractiveness of the token currency.The marketing function is also supported by the continuous increase in value of the project tokenanother advantage achieved for the NFT project.Explorerhttps://bscscan.com/token/0xb2ebbff04bdcb3ded0cb99c544521a17e940ff96https://explorer.bitquery.io/bsc/token/0xb2ebbff04bdcb3ded0cb99c544521a17e940ff96Source codehttps://bscscan.com/address/0xb2ebbff04bdcb3ded0cb99c544521a17e940ff96#codehttps://github.com/PIXELmillionNFT/Sourcecode-IXI/blob/main/Sourcecode%20MillionPixel%20%5BIXI%5DWhitepaperhttps://github.com/PIXELmillionNFT/Whitepaper-IXI-Million-Pixel/blob/main/WHITEPAPER%20MILLION%20PIXEL%20PROJECT%20%5BXIX%5D%20(1).pdfAudithttps://github.com/PIXELmillionNFT/Audit_Tech_Rate_XIX/blob/main/audit_rate_tech_million-pixel_XIX_august2022_.pdfburn hashhttps://bscscan.com/tx/0xd441a1a34cd554541579bc473b91f92d1c47254e9fc9939606cecc4e8433c05aofficial Mailcontact@million-pixel-token.comsupport@million-pixel-token.comWebseitehttps://www.million-pixel-token.comSocial´stiktokhttps://youtube.com/channel/UCMNWzZOUan_JH-noc8dSYPgyoutubetiktok.com/@millionpixeltokentwitterhttps://twitter.com/XIXPIXELtelegramhttps://t.me/millionpixelixiGithubhttps://github.com/PIXELmillionNFT?tab=repositoriesMediumhttps://medium.com/@nft.million.pixelMeet the TeamCEO -
